title: Any reason why I haven't gotten a single key fragment in the last 20 wins?
body: I usually get fragments quite frequently even if I've already got about 3-6 in a month but this month I've gotten like none. I've legit been spamming games to try and get 1 last fragment for a key but no luck {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
From Riot Support:
"With each fragment you earn, the chance to earn your next one goes down slightly. This number resets roughly every thirty days after you earn your first key fragment."

I think this is might be what is currently happening - if so, the reset should be happening quite soon for you and you'll start getting key fragments again. This has happened to me a few times, and it can be disappointing when you hardly get any fragments after many games. But if your key fragment rate doesn't reset, then it might be this:

"There's currently a bug which prevents you from earning key fragments if you're playing a champion you don't own. This is unintended, and we're working on a solution."

Hope this helped :)
Lol how is this a bug it says clearly that you cant earn key fragments on a champion you dont own.
I was about to go find this post for him/her, thanks for the time save!
